description_for_human: ⚡ The Complete X/Twitter Automation Toolkit — Scrapers, MCP server for AI agents (Claude/GPT), CLI, browser scripts. No API fees. Open source. Unfollow people who don't follow back. Monitor real-time analytics. Auto follow, like, comment, scrape, without API.
